\newcommand{\drawtri}[4][]{
\foreach \A/\B/\C/\D [count=\K] in {#4}
{\unless\ifnum\K=1
\coordinate (aux1) at ($(\A)!.5!(\B)$);
\coordinate (aux2) at ($(\B)!.5!(\C)$);
\coordinate (aux3) at ($(\C)!.5!(\D)$);
\coordinate (aux4) at ($(\D)!.5!(#4[\K,1])$);
\path ($(\A)!(aux1)!(\B)$) -- (\B) node[midway,]{\tiny \dots};
\path ($(\B)!(aux2)!(\C)$) -- (\C) node[midway,]{\tiny \dots};
\path ($(\C)!(aux3)!(\D)$) -- (\D) node[midway,]{\tiny \dots};
\draw[shorten >=2mm,shorten <=2mm] (#4[\K,1]) -- (aux4) node[pos=0.34,above]{#3};
\coordinate (aux5) at (intersection of #1--aux1 and #2--aux2);
\coordinate (aux6) at (intersection of #2--aux2 and #3--aux3);
\coordinate (aux7) at (intersection of #3--aux3 and #4[\K,1]--#4[\K,1-|aux4]);
\path (aux7) -- (#4[\K,1-|aux4]) node[midway]{\tiny \dots};
\draw[shorten >=2mm,shorten <=2mm] (aux5) -- (#4[\K,1]);
\draw[shorten >=2mm,shorten <=2mm] (aux6) -- (aux7);
\fi
}
}

\begin{tikzpicture}[
  >={Straight Barb[inset=0pt,length=5pt]},
  shorten >=1pt,
  shorten <=1pt,
  line width=1pt,
  inner sep=0.5pt,
  outer sep=0.5pt,
  font={\small}]
\begin{scope}[shift={(-4,2)}]
  \draw[fill=gray!20]
    (0,0) coordinate (a)
      -- (0,1) coordinate (b)
      -- (-1,1) coordinate (c)
      -- (-2,1) coordinate (d)
      -- (-3,1) coordinate (e)
      -- (-3,2) coordinate (f)
      -- (-2,2) coordinate (g)
      -- (-1,2) coordinate (h)
      -- (a)
    ;
  \draw[dashed]
    (e) -- (f)
    (d) -- (g)
    ;
  \draw
    (b) -- (c)
    (b) -- (h)
    (c) -- (h)
    (c) -- (g)
    (d) -- (e)
    (d) -- (f)
    (e) -- (g)
    (e) -- (h)
    (h) -- (g)
    (a) -- (b)
    ;
  \draw[fill=white]
    (a) circle (2pt)
    (b) circle (2pt)
    (c) circle (2pt)
    (d) circle (2pt)
    (e) circle (2pt)
    (f) circle (2pt)
    (g) circle (2pt)
    (h) circle (2pt)
    ;
  \node[inner sep=0,outer sep=0] at (0,1.5) {$T_3$};
  \node[inner sep=0,outer sep=2] at (-1.5,2.5) {$T_2$};
  \node[inner sep=0,outer sep=2] at (0.5,3) {$T_1$};
\end{scope}

\draw[thick]
  (a) edge (b)
  (a) edge (c)
  (a) edge (d)
  (a) edge (e)
  (a) edge (f)
  (a) edge (g)
  (b) edge (c)
  (b) edge (h)
  (c) edge (h)
  (c) edge (g)
  (d) edge (e)
  (d) edge (f)
  (e) edge (g)
  (e) edge (h)
  (h) edge (g)
  ;
\draw
  (2,0.5) coordinate (a)
    -- (2,1.5) coordinate (b)
    -- (1,2) coordinate (c)
    -- (0,2) coordinate (d)
    -- (-1,2.5) coordinate (e)
    -- (-2,3) coordinate (f)
    -- (-2,3.5) coordinate (g)
    -- (-2.5,4) coordinate (h)
    -- (-3,4.5) coordinate (i)
    -- (-3,5) coordinate (j)
    -- (-2,5.5) coordinate (k)
    -- (-1,5) coordinate (l)
    -- (0,5.5) coordinate (m)
    -- (1,5) coordinate (n)
    -- (2,5.5) coordinate (o)
    -- (2,6) coordinate (p)
    ;
  \draw[dashed]
    (j) -- (i)
    (k) -- (j)
    (h) -- (i)
    (h) -- (k)
    (g) -- (l)
    (g) -- (k)
    (m) -- (l)
    (b) -- (d)
    (b) -- (e)
    (f) -- (j)
    (f) -- (i)
    (e) -- (l)
    ;
  \draw[<->,shorten <=0.5pt]
    (p) -- node[below] {$aa$} (p -| o)
    ;
  \draw[<->,shorten <=0.5pt]
    (p -| o) -- node[right] {$bb$} (o)
    ;
  \draw[<->,shorten <=0.5pt]
    (p -| o).. controls (1,5.5) and (1,5.5).. (i)
    ;
  \draw[<->,shorten <=0.5pt]
    (a) -- node[left] {$aa$} (a -| b)
    ;
  \draw[<->,shorten <=0.5pt]
    (a -| b) -- node[right] {$bb$} (b)
    ;
  \draw[<->,shorten <=0.5pt]
    (a -| b) -- (a)
    ;
\end{tikzpicture}
